version_description:
BigOven is excited to introduce a revamped, interactive home screen to bring you exciting recipe options right when you open the app! On this home screen, you will find delicious seasonal recipes, recent raves, and the latest and greatest from BigOven. We’ve also made some changes to our navigation so it’s easier than ever to access your favorite BigOven features. Get Ideas, My Recipes, Grocery List, Menu Planner and Use Up Leftovers are now one-click away.

Thanks for the feedback on version 6.0! We've squished some bugs and incorporated some improvements.

Let us know what you think at support@bigoven.com. Happy cooking!

BigOven is excited to introduce an improved, interactive home screen to bring you exciting recipe options right when you open the app! On this home screen, you will find delicious seasonal recipes, recent raves, and the latest and greatest from BigOven. 
 
We’ve also made some changes to our navigation so it’s easier than ever to access your favorite BigOven features. Get Ideas, My Recipes, Grocery List, Menu Planner and Use Up Leftovers are now one-click away. Your personal recipe collection (Favorites, Recipes to Try, Added and Folders) are one click away under “My Recipes.”
 
Like the new look? We’d love to hear your feedback at support@bigoven.com. Happy cooking!

Be sure to install the ALL-NEW preview version of BigOven elsewhere on the App Store. (We have a second listing on the App Store for the new version of the app, allowing both versions to be in-market while we put the finishing touches on the new version of the new app.)  To get the ALL-NEW version of BigOven, simply search for "BigOven -- Recipes, Grocery List and Meal Plan". Soon, you'll get the major update here in this listing.

(https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bigoven-recipes-grocery-list/id996765041?mt=8)

App features

Want to search your own recipes? You got it! We’ve updated the app so you can search your own recipes or search all of BigOven’s public recipes. And if you like to share your recipes with friends and family, we’ve made that even easier by placing it at the top of the recipe.

Thanks for using BigOven! We’ve taken the things you love about BigOven and made them even better! The ground-up redesign offers a simpler, faster and easier way to get dinner on the table:

* Get inspiration from friends, family and food bloggers
* Find recipes even faster with all-new Search
* Shop smarter and better at the grocery store, including off-line and household account sharing
* Get around the app faster with clearer navigation
* See activity on your recipes with an all-new Activity view

We’re always trying to improve your cooking, planning, sharing and shopping experience. If you enjoy our app, please let us know. Happy cooking!

Thanks for using BigOven! We’ve been busy making improvements to bring you a better experience. This release includes:

Menu planner - by popular demand, adding notes is back! And you can add to your grocery list from the planner.
Grocery list - notes are visible on your list
Add a photo on recipe detail
General improvements and optimizations

Thanks for using BigOven! We’ve been busy making improvements to bring you a better experience. This release includes some significant general improvements, optimizations and fixes for automated synchronization, and Grocery List and Menu Planner usage.

Thanks for using BigOven! We’ve been busy making improvements to bring you a better experience. This release includes:

- Grocery list sync improvements
- More visible add to grocery list from menu planner
- My Recipes filter fix (for Breakfast category)
- Spelling suggestions on search
- In-app billing and authentication updates
- Miscellaneous fixes and improvements

Thanks for using BigOven! We’ve been busy making improvements to bring you a better experience. This release includes:

- Grocery list sync improvements
- More visible add to grocery list from menu planner
- My Recipes filter fix (for Breakfast category)
- Spelling suggestions on search
- In-app billing and authentication updates
- Miscellaneous fixes and improvements

Thanks for using BigOven! This update includes:

- The new "BigOven Share" extension lets you easily share a recipe to your family and friends on BigOven.
- We've also done some fixes to menu plan.

Thanks for using BigOven! This update includes:

- 'BigOven Share' extension lets you easily share recipes with your family and friends on BigOven
- Improved syncing on Grocery List so that you always have the most accurate list on hand
- The new BigOven widget in the Today View shows you what's on your Menu Plan today

Thanks for using BigOven! This update includes:

- Stability release; fixes for push notification linking, and other deep linking
- Facebook login fix
Thanks for using BigOven. This update includes some bug fixes.
Thanks for using BigOven. This update includes some bug fixes.

Thanks for using BigOven! We’re always working to make the app better and help you get dinner on the table. 

What's new for this release? We are debuting our iPad interface. We'd love to hear your thoughts.

Thanks for using BigOven! We’re always working to make the app better and help you get dinner on the table. 

What's new for this release? 
- Now you can reply to reviews to ask questions, add your own suggestions and more!
- In My Recipes, option to view your recipes via pictures or as a list
Thanks for using BigOven! We’re always working to make the app better and help you get dinner on the table. What's new for this release? We made some performance improvements and general bug fixes.
Thanks for using BigOven! We're always working to make the app better and help you get dinner on the table. What's new for this release? We made some performance improvements and general bug fixes.

What's new?

-Grocery List is now available on your wrist! Try BigOven for Watch® today.
-Minor fixes and improvements.

We update the app regularly to provide you with the best BigOven experience. 

What's new?
Use Up Leftovers gets a new look! Input 1-3 items and see results.
View multiple recipe photos - Swipe through to see additional photos of a recipe.
Recipe detail embedded web view - See an expanded view of a clipped recipes’s instructions.
New profile side panel - Easily access your info to edit and update.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Minor fixes and improvements.

We're constantly making improvements to the app!

In this update:
-Fixed a bug with inviting users to join a household
-Resolved an issue some users experienced when signing in
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
We've made a bunch of fixes/improvements to ensure a great BigOven experience on iOS 11 and the new iPhone X.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements
We’ve been working hard to squash some bugs and improve the BigOven app. This update includes bug fixes and performance enhancements. For any issues please contact us at: support@bigoven.com
We’ve been working hard to squash some bugs and improve the BigOven app. This update includes bug fixes and performance enhancements. For any issues please contact us at: support@bigoven.com

We are working hard to update as much as possible to improve the experience for you. This update includes a fix to recipe scanning and attaching photos, as well as some other feature enhancements. For any issues please contact us at: support@bigoven.com

Hi, BigOven Cooks! We have been working to improve the experience of BigOven. Here are the adjustments we have made to get you cooking!
Calendar Crash Fixed
Multiple screen adjuments for newer iPhone models
Ad Adjustments
Bug fixes and enhancements.
Bug fixes and enhancements.
